_A.description: Library ABIE XML namespace string (for ASBIEs)

RemittanceAdvice.description: A document that specifies details of an actual payment.

RemittanceAdvice.title: Remittance Advice. Details
RemittanceAdvice.description: A document that specifies details of an actual payment.

UBLExtensions.title: UBLExtensions
UBLExtensions.description: An optional set of extensions to the committee model

UBLVersionID.title: Remittance Advice. UBL Version Identifier. Identifier
UBLVersionID.description: Identifies the earliest version of the UBL 2 schema for this document type that defines all of the elements that might be encountered in the current instance.

CustomizationID.title: Remittance Advice. Customization Identifier. Identifier
CustomizationID.description: Identifies a user-defined customization of UBL for a specific use.

ProfileID.title: Remittance Advice. Profile Identifier. Identifier
ProfileID.description: Identifies a user-defined profile of the customization of UBL being used.

ProfileExecutionID.title: Remittance Advice. Profile Execution Identifier. Identifier
ProfileExecutionID.description: Identifies an instance of executing a profile, to associate all transactions in a collaboration.

ID.title: Remittance Advice. Identifier
ID.description: An identifier for this document, assigned by the sender.

CopyIndicator.title: Remittance Advice. Copy_ Indicator. Indicator
CopyIndicator.description: Indicates whether this document is a copy (true) or not (false).

UUID.title: Remittance Advice. UUID. Identifier
UUID.description: A universally unique identifier for an instance of this document.

IssueDate.title: Remittance Advice. Issue Date. Date
IssueDate.description: The date, assigned by the sender, on which this document was issued.

IssueTime.title: Remittance Advice. Issue Time. Time
IssueTime.description: The time, assigned by the sender, at which this document was issued.

Note.title: Remittance Advice. Note. Text
Note.description: Free-form text pertinent to this document, conveying information that is not contained explicitly in other structures.

DocumentCurrencyCode.title: Remittance Advice. Document_ Currency Code. Code
DocumentCurrencyCode.description: A code signifying the default currency for this document.

TotalDebitAmount.title: Remittance Advice. Total_ Debit Amount. Amount
TotalDebitAmount.description: The totals of all debit amounts for the Remittance Advice.

TotalCreditAmount.title: Remittance Advice. Total_ Credit Amount. Amount
TotalCreditAmount.description: The totals of all credit amounts for the Remittance Advice.

TotalPaymentAmount.title: Remittance Advice. Total_ Payment Amount. Amount
TotalPaymentAmount.description: The total payable amount for the Remittance Advice (must be positive).

PaymentOrderReference.title: Remittance Advice. Payment Order Reference. Text
PaymentOrderReference.description: An internal reference to the order for payment from the payer to the payer's bank.

PayerReference.title: Remittance Advice. Payer_ Reference. Text
PayerReference.description: An internal reference to the payer's order for payment.

InvoicingPartyReference.title: Remittance Advice. Invoicing Party_ Reference. Text
InvoicingPartyReference.description: An internal reference to the order for payment by the invoicing party. This may have been requested of the payer by the payee to accompany the payer's remittance.

LineCountNumeric.title: Remittance Advice. Line Count. Numeric
LineCountNumeric.description: The number of Remittance Advice Lines in the document.

InvoicePeriod.title: Remittance Advice. Invoice_ Period. Period
InvoicePeriod.description: A period (rather than a specific invoice) associated with this document.

BillingReference.title: Remittance Advice. Billing Reference
BillingReference.description: A reference to a billing document associated with this document.

AdditionalDocumentReference.title: Remittance Advice. Additional_ Document Reference. Document Reference
AdditionalDocumentReference.description: A reference to an additional document associated with this document.

Signature.title: Remittance Advice. Signature
Signature.description: A signature applied to this document.

AccountingCustomerParty.title: Remittance Advice. Accounting_ Customer Party. Customer Party

AccountingSupplierParty.title: Remittance Advice. Accounting_ Supplier Party. Supplier Party

TaxTotal.title: Remittance Advice. Tax Total
TaxTotal.description: The total amount of a specific type of tax.
